data.name: The Ball Flow - First Approach
data.detailed_description:
Thank you for visit my store!


I'm an indie alone developer. The game could isn't enough to you, But I wish this game make your feeling better.

Major game Feature


  • Roll the ball and explore beautiful world.
You can see the lot of trees , flowers and bushes.

  • Change the Material for move through.
You can choose three balls.
First, Wooden ball. It can use generous situation for avoid obstacle.
Second, Rock ball. It will defend damage from moving.
Last, Magic ball. This allow you to move faster and float in atmosphere .

  • Find your own way to goal.
This three Ball is essential to explore world and find a way to goal.

data.short_description: You can roll the ball with three different material, And it will help your variety game play. Explore world and find your way to goal.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 4th generation
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad core processor or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
